com.marklogic.hub.dataservices

Interface JobService


  • public interface JobService
    Defines endpoints for managing Job documents

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • on

        static JobService on(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient db)
        Creates a JobService object for executing operations on the database server. The DatabaseClientFactory class can create the DatabaseClient parameter. A single client object can be used for any number of requests and in multiple threads.
        Parameters:
        db - provides a client for communicating with the database server
        Returns:
        an object for executing database operations

      • on

        static JobService on(com.marklogic.client.DatabaseClient db,
                     com.marklogic.client.io.marker.JSONWriteHandle serviceDeclaration)
        Creates a JobService object for executing operations on the database server. The DatabaseClientFactory class can create the DatabaseClient parameter. A single client object can be used for any number of requests and in multiple threads. The service declaration uses a custom implementation of the same service instead of the default implementation of the service by specifying an endpoint directory in the modules database with the implementation. A service.json file with the declaration can be read with FileHandle or a string serialization of the JSON declaration with StringHandle.
        Parameters:
        db - provides a client for communicating with the database server
        serviceDeclaration - substitutes a custom implementation of the service
        Returns:
        an object for executing database operations

        Updates the Job document associated with the given jobId to note that the step has been started
        Parameters:
        jobId - provides input
        stepNumber - provides input
